name: Mixed Menu of Food Questions Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What are the main ingredients of the Indian dish Sag Aloo?
questions.explanation:
Spinach and potato.

	Sag = spinach, Aloo = potato

questions.text: Which sauce is traditionally served with pork?
questions.explanation:
Apple.

	At one time a pig's head would be served with an apple in its mouth

questions.text: Which herb is used to flavour pesto?
questions.explanation:
Basil.

	Pesto sauce is an Italian favourite, made of basil mashed into olive oil.

Cheese.

	Lymeswold was a cheese devised by the Milk Marketing Board

questions.text: Which of the following UK towns does not have a dish named after it?
questions.explanation:
Felixstowe.

	Bakewell has Bakewell Tart, Dundee and Eccles have each given their name to cakes

questions.text: What was Mrs Beeton's first name?
questions.explanation:
Isabella.

	Mrs Beeton wrote a famous 19th century cookbook

questions.text: Who runs the celebrated River Cafe in London?
questions.explanation:
Ruth Rogers and Rose Grey.

	Ruth Rogers is married to the distinguished architect Richard Rogers

questions.text: Which of the following would you not want to find in a kitchen?
questions.explanation:
Silverfish.

	Silverfish are insects which can infest food cupboards. Whitebait and Monkfish are fish, Silverside is a cut of meat.

questions.text: Beefsteak, Vine and Plum are all kinds of...
questions.explanation:
Tomato.

	Beef, Plum and Vine are all kinds of tomato. Apple is not!

questions.text: Which dish is associated with the Wimbledon tennis tournament?
questions.explanation:
Strawberries and cream.

	Strawberry prices traditionally rocket during Wimbledon fortnight
